officialTitle: An Open-label Extension Study of Levoketoconazole (2S,4R-ketoconazole) in the Treatment of Endogenous Cushing's Syndrome
summary: This is a long-term, open-label extension study of levoketoconazole in participants with endogenous Cushing's Syndrome.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportions of Participants With Mean Urinary Free Cortisol (mUFC) Categorization Based on Upper Limit of Normal (ULN)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From parent study Baseline to final study visit or up to a maximum of 3 years, whichever comes first.
